snippet: China's wealthiest man - once a poor laborer in a salt plant - started out in business 25 years ago using a small loan to open a soft-drink and popsicle stand at a primary school. A new list of China's super-rich puts Zong Qinghou's wealth at $12.6...
abstract: China's wealthiest man - once a poor laborer in a salt plant - started out in business 25 years ago using a small loan to open a soft-drink and popsicle stand at a primary school. A new list of China's super-rich puts Zong Qinghou's wealth at $12.6 billion.

headline.main: From Popsicle Maker to Beverage Billionaire, China's Richest Man
